title: Our Perfect Rental Is Waiting For You
description: Apartment: 2 Bedroom Suite, Eastern Barrington & Barrington Harbor neighborhood. Hardwoods throughout, completely updated, new appliances. One full bathroom w/ full bathtub & shower, plus an additional half-bath. Large yard, private driveway parking. A block away from the water with local water access at adjacent street. Available immediately. Flexible lease terms.

title: Brand new 2 Bedroom Condo Available immediately in Barrington
description: VIEW MORE PICS AND OVER 100 MORE APARTMENTS ON OUR SITE!

Description: We currently have a first floor level condo which has just been built and has never been lived in. It is conveniently located just off Bay Spring Avenue just behind the East Bay bike path and only a short walk to the beach. The apartment is available immediately. This apartment consists of two bedrooms and one and a half bathrooms. The bedrooms are 10x10 so if you have a king bed this probably isn't the unit for you but if you are looking for a quiet wonderful place to call home feel free to give us a call. This unit has a washer and dryer in the apartment and has forced hot air heating and central air. For more information and to set up a private showing contact Gabe at

Elevator, assigned parking, gas grill, walking trails and spectacular Community Room.  Income restrictions apply. Please call

title: House for Rent - Feb 3rd-June 30
description: Furnished Rental  - Immaculate, completely renovated, brand new, home. Barrington public schools #1 in R.I., light-filled rooms, spectacular water views, safe, quiet, clean neighborhood. Approx. 2000 sq feet

Two decks, the length of the house, upstairs and down, west-facing, gorgeous sunsets. Remote control A/C and Hunter Douglas window shades throughout, retractable awning on second-floor deck, remote control skylights on 3rd flr., driveway parking for 2 cars. Brand new shed in yard for storage.

1st flr.; kitchen, all new stainless steel appliances (gas stove), dining area/dining table, bar seating, family room, gas fireplace, stackable washer/dryer, full bath, walk out the sliding glass door and step out onto the deck for coffee and breakfast with views of the Bullock's Point Cove.

2nd flr.; two spacious bedrooms (2 twin beds in one room, plus 2 closets), 2nd bedroom (loft style) has twin-sized daybed with twin trundle below which rolls out for additional sleeping space. This room can be used as a bedroom/den/home office (built-in desk - workspace), closet, half bath.  Separate deck access from both 2nd floor bedrooms.
3rd flr., master suite (queen bed), walk-in closet, built -in shelving, full bath, skylights, panoramic views.
Kitchen fully stocked; dishes, glasses, cookware, utensils, etc.  All linens and furniture are brand new.

Bay Spring neighborhood; walk to and enjoy; Allins Cove, Latham Park, Lighthouse Marina, Haines Park, Cove Haven Marina, East Bay Bike Path.  Five-minute drive to Riverside for commercial district - Shaw's grocery, Rite Aid Pharmacy, Liquor Store, Dunkin Donuts, Pizza, etc. 20-minute drive to downtown Providence.

Outstanding schools, available starting Feb. 3rd, 2020 - June 30, 2020. One month security deposit, lease, two references required, background check, absolutely no smoking, no pets, no outdoor grilling.

title: Quiet 4 room 2nd floor apartment
description: 4 room 2nd floor apartment in quiet neighborhood, well maintained yard, off street parking for 1 vehicle.
Walking distance to East Bay Bike Path/Haines Park/ Latham Park/ waterfront
Rent includes Heat/Hot Water/Free on site Laundry/ 5'x12' storage area.
No smoking/vaping of any substances, no pets of any type.
Tenant responsible for Electric/Cable/Internet/Phone. No Direct TV/Dish antennas

title: Two bedroom house
description: Two bedroom house, great location, quiet, new appliances, hardwood floors, $2800. plus utilities,

title: Apartment for Rent - 6 Month Lease
description: Second floor apartment available 15 January 2020 for six month lease off Maple Avenue.  Apartment includes refrigerator and stove.  One garage parking space included and external parking available.  Laundry hook ups available but washer/dryer not provided.  Very nice neighborhood.

title: BARRINGTON/WALKTOWATER/SINGLEFAMILY
description: BARRINGTON / WALK TO WATER / SINGLE FAMILY HOUSE FOR RENT - Enjoy this lovely single family home with large fenced back yard on a dead end street.  The house boasts rights to an association with dock and water rights on Hundred Acre Cove.  Four generous bedrooms including a master suite, 2.5 baths, unfurnished home is available for a short term rental.  New furnace, hardwoods, updated kitchen, finished basement and 2 car attached garage.  A terrific property in Sowams school district, available December 15 through July 31.
